imdb.plot outline: Cynical, unapologetic, and delightfully crass, the Seasoned Cynic guides you through the perils of entertaining, offering time-tested tips, tricks, and advice! With her sexy hunk of meat Fernando, her "french" maid Sabrina, and the loved neighborhood peeper Tom, the Seasoned Cynic shows you that she can handle anything thrown her way!
imdb.title: The Seasoned Cynic's Guide to Entertaining
akas: The Seasoned Cynic's Guide to Entertaining (United States)
plot: Cynical, unapologetic, and delightfully crass, a glamorous chef points out what can go wrong when entertaining and provides reliable, time-tested solutions.::Madeleine Dee

Cynical, unapologetic, and delightfully crass, the Seasoned Cynic guides you through the perils of entertaining, offering time-tested tips, tricks, and advice! With her sexy hunk of meat Fernando, her "french" maid Sabrina, and the loved neighborhood peeper Tom, the Seasoned Cynic shows you that she can handle anything thrown her way!::Chris Petty
